title.narrative: WASH Assistance for vulnerable host and out-of-camp South Sudanese Refugees in El Jabalian locality,

description.narrative: Project overall objective is to provide services and facilities to at least 25,000 people (about 5,000 HHs) in 8 villages (Alagaya, Alganaa, Almagabi, Alaoudha, Almusalameia Kaja, Kilikees, Shandi Foog, Um Alguara - Kanbo 4) in El Jabalian locality, White Nile State. Affected population to be targeted by the project will be vulnerable host communities (HCs) and out of camp South Sudanese refugees (SSRs), t schools and health facilities (provision of sanitation and hygiene facilities). The objective contributes to WASH sector priorities : Provide and enable affected people’s access to basic water services, Provide and enable affected people access to limited sanitation services and Provide and enable affected people access to hygiene services The following activities will be delivered; 1. Rehabilitate 4 water pipeline systems in Alagaya, Alganaa, Almagabi, Alaoudha villages 2.Rehabilitate (elevated tanks and piping systems) one hafir in Almusalameia Kaja village 3. Standard Activity : Conduct WASH-related training at community and/or institution level Conduct 5 three-day trainings/refresher trainings for 5 Water User Committees (100 people) 4. Provide operation and maintenance tools to the 5 Water User Committees on the rehabilitated water pipeline systems and hafir 5. Construct, with inputs from community members, 16 latrines in 4 schools; 8 latrines in 2 health centres and 16 latrines in 4 community/social centres. The latrines will be constructed in blocks, one block having four drop-holes 6. Conduct 160 bi-monthly waste collection and management campaigns in 8 villages. Breakdown: 2 campaigns per month for eight villages for ten months 7. Conduct 160 awareness campaigns on safe personal, household, and environmental sanitation and hygiene practices in 8 villages: Breakdown - 2 campaigns per village per month for ten months 8. Conduct 8 three-day trainings for 160 Hygiene Promotors on PHAST 9. Conduct 4 three-day trainings for 80 children on CHAST
